Title: DocX
Description: DocX is a .NET library written in C# which allows a developer to manipulate Word files in an easy and intuitive way.
HomeWiki:
October 2, 2017

The project's new home is now on Github at https://github.com/xceedsoftware/docx

DocX a .NET library that allows developers to manipulate Word files with the .DOCX format that was introduced as of Word 2007. DocX is fast, lightweight, easy to use, and best of all it does not require Microsoft Word or Office to be installed.
